code: import React from'react';import{MapTo}from'@adobe/aem-react-editable-components';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";require('./BlogList.css');export const CustomEditConfig={emptyLabel:'Blog List',isEmpty:function(props){return!props||!props.blogList;}};export default function BlogList(props){const blogListItems=Array.isArray(props.blogList)?props.blogList:[];if(CustomEditConfig.isEmpty(props)){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Hello"})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"blog-tiles",children:blogListItems.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-tiles-list",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:item.blogLink,style:{textDecoration:"none"},className:"blog-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"dispatcher",className:"blog-item-div",style:{border:"1px solid #ccc",borderRadius:"8px",overflow:"hidden",boxShadow:"0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.blogImg,alt:"Card Image",style:{width:"100%",height:"auto",display:"block"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"16px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"dispatcherTag",style:{marginTop:"7px",marginBottom:"7px",fontSize:"13px",borderRadius:"20px",width:"fit-content",padding:"3px 15px"},children:item.blogName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"one-line",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"blog-title",style:{fontSize:"1em",color:"#555"},children:item.blogTitle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"publishDate",children:item.blogDate})]})]})})},index))});};MapTo('spa-react/components/content/blogList')(BlogList,CustomEditConfig);
